#labels Phase-Implementation
# root OSMan object.

= Summary =

Application is root OSMan object. This object supports methods for listing of availaible modules and objects, object creation and accessing OSMan global settings.


= Interface =

  # [IOSManAll OSManAll interface]
  # `createObject(string objClassName)`
  Create object by short or full [class_name object class name] and returns it. If no object class found exception raised.
  # `getModules()`
  Returns list of loaded [module modules] as [safe_array safe array] of string [variant variants].
  # `getModuleClasses(string moduleName)`
  Get available classes in module `moduleName`. Returns list of [class_name short class names] of available objects as [safe_array safe array] of string [variant variants]. If no module found zero-length array returned.
  # `log(string logMessage)`
  Write `logMessage` into global logger. If no logger set then nothing happen.
  # `logger`
  Global [ILog logging] interface set & get property.
